snippet.title: Heartland Trailer
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE NOW: https://victor-weidar.itch.io/heartland

Heartland is a game by Victor Weidar, Paul Frame and Lanz De Jesus. A change in home is never easy. Home is something crafted over time, it holds memories and experiences. Heartland explores how both home and our way of life can change unexpectedly through experiencing the last perfect day of a family.
